$MSFT zero bounce 😳

$AMZN always interesting that Amazon gets lumped in with tech like $FB $MSFT $GOOG etc. Amazon is a retail and logistics company with a website as their customer purchasing portal. Yes, I get that they have AWS. They should be a hedge against market downturns like this, or at least stable, esp considering some of this is fuelled by a virus that drives demand for online shopping. This is an odd stock - trading sideways for a year and jumping to over 3700 only to drop back down to levels seen over a year ago.

$MSFT $GOOGL $AAPL $SPY $QQQ
